Birthday Parties

Celebrate your special day with a gymnastics-themed party

Party Packages

  • Basic Package: 1.5 hours, up to 15 children - $200
  • Deluxe Package: 2 hours, up to 20 children - $280
  • Premium Package: 2.5 hours, up to 25 children - $350

What's Included

  • Supervised gymnastics activities
  • Party room with tables and chairs
  • Basic decorations
  • Party coordinator
  • Clean-up service

Add-Ons

  • Party Favors: $5 per child
  • Custom Decorations: $30
  • Photography: $50
  • Extra Time: $50 per hour

Age Groups

  • Ages 3-5: Parent & child activities
  • Ages 6-8: Guided gymnastics games
  • Ages 9-12: Skill-based activities
  • Ages 13+: Advanced challenges

Booking Information

Available Times

  • Saturday: 10:00 AM, 1:00 PM, 4:00 PM
  • Sunday: 11:00 AM, 2:00 PM, 5:00 PM

Booking Requirements

  • Minimum 2 weeks advance notice
  • 50% deposit required
  • Final headcount 48 hours before
  • Waivers for all participants

Ready to Book?

Contact us to plan your perfect gymnastics party!
